postFeatureReview.summary: Implemented Guides listing page and navigation menus for GB and IE regions. Created region-specific siteConfig for IE with localized article slugs. Added Bettor Resources navigation item to both regions.
postFeatureReview.impact: Changed files: src/app/[region]/guides/page.tsx (new listing page), src/data/regions/gb/en/siteConfig.ts (GB navigation), src/data/regions/ie/en/siteConfig.ts (new IE-specific config), src/data/regions/ie/en/index.ts (exports). All guide articles verified working for both regions.
postFeatureReview.issues: PRD article slugs didn't match actual data (e.g., 'uk-betting-industry-report-2026' vs actual 'uk-betting-market-analysis-2026', 'ireland-betting-bonus-guide-2026' vs actual 'ie-betting-bonus-guide-2026'). Fixed during verification. mainNavigation in siteConfig is not yet used by SiteHeader component (hardcoded navigation).
postFeatureReview.recommendations: Consider integrating mainNavigation from siteConfig into SiteHeader component to enable region-specific navigation. Current SiteHeader uses hardcoded nav items that don't support dropdown menus.
